CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: reported that n-channel OFET based on a bithiophene imide homopolymer exhibited a μ e of 1.1 x 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , I on / I off of 2 x 10^7 , and a high V th ( 75 V ) in vacuum after annealing process at 240 ° C. 27 The fused - ring system can maximize the π-orbital overlap by restricting intramolecular rotation in the oligomer and possibly to induce face - to - face π-stacking , facilitating charge transport through intermolecular hopping.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| bithiophene imide homopolymer |
| fused-ring system |
| oligomer |

Note: "bithiophene imide homopolymer" and "fused-ring system" are both considered as Material Names, as they describe specific chemical structures. "Oligomer" is also a Material Name, but it is a more general term that refers to a class of materials, rather than a specific compound.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Here's the updated table with the valid entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| bithiophene imide homopolymer |
| fused-ring system |

The following entities were removed:

* "oligomer" (too general, does not refer to a specific material)
* "V" (notation for voltage, not a material name)
* "μ" (Greek letter mu, not a material name)
* "cm^2" (unit of area, not a material name)
* "s^-1" (unit of time, not a material name)
* "°C" (unit of temperature, not a material name)

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: reported that n-channel OFET based on a bithiophene imide homopolymer exhibited a μ e of 1.1 x 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , I on / I off of 2 x 10^7 , and a high V th ( 75 V ) in vacuum after annealing process at 240 ° C. 27 The fused - ring system can maximize the π-orbital overlap by restricting intramolecular rotation in the oligomer and possibly to induce face - to - face π-stacking , facilitating charge transport through intermolecular hopping.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| μe |
| Ion/Ioff |
| Vth |

Note:

* μe represents the electron mobility.
* Ion/Ioff represents the current on/off ratio.
* Vth represents the threshold voltage.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for my previous mistake. Here are the valid entities that clearly refer to material properties in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| μe |
| Vth |

The table shows the following material properties:

* μe: electron mobility
* Vth: threshold voltage

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: reported that n-channel OFET based on a bithiophene imide homopolymer exhibited a μ e of 1.1 x 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , I on / I off of 2 x 10^7 , and a high V th ( 75 V ) in vacuum after annealing process at 240 ° C. 27 The fused - ring system can maximize the π-orbital overlap by restricting intramolecular rotation in the oligomer and possibly to induce face - to - face π-stacking , facilitating charge transport through intermolecular hopping.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| μe | 1.1 x 10^-2 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1 |
| Ion/Ioff | 2 x 10^7 |
| Vth | 75 V |
| Annealing temperature | 240 °C |

Note:

* μe represents the electron mobility.
* Ion/Ioff represents the current on/off ratio.
* Vth represents the threshold voltage.
* Annealing temperature is the temperature at which the sample was annealed.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| μe | 1.1 x 10^-2 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1 |
| Vth | 75 V |

The following entities do not clearly refer to the value of a material property and were removed from the table:

* Ion/Ioff (represents the current on/off ratio, not a material property)
* Annealing temperature (represents the temperature at which the sample was annealed, not a material property)
